name: Isolated Life
description:
In this world of the future, you've fallen into an island in the middle of the ocean, and here you're building an isolated life from all over the world. It's up to you to collect the necessary supplies and build what's on your mind. You can go to different islands and build there. What's more, the Prototype Robot character allows construction underwater. So you're completely free. You can consolidate and change their appearance by improving their structure. Start your isolated life and build what you want!

Key Features:

  • Collect Source:
There are different sources in the world. The basics are rocks and woods. You have to these sources for making any build.

  • Finding Available Place for Build:
You can build on all the floors that aren't very inclined. Even under water!

  • Upgrade Your Build:
Collect rocks , and upgrade your build! Upgraded structures are more durable than wood structures.
